member.summary: Gets or sets the function code(JavaScript).

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.YFunctionSeries.FunctionCodeError
member.summary: Gets the error text which was returned after evaluating FunctionCode expression. Returns empty string if the code was evaluated without errors or FunctionCode property value is empty.

member.summary: Identifies the PeriodProperty dependency property.

member.summary: Called when period was changed.

member.summary: Update plotted data values.

member.summary: Perform the processing of data values.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.MovingAverage.Period
member.summary: Gets or sets the period of moving average. The period is the number of previous points used for calculating mean value at the current point.

member.name: T:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType
member.summary: Specifies fit type for trend line.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.Polynom
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1*x + C2*x2 + : + Cn-1*xn-1, where n - number of terms.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.Exponent
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * exp( C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.Logarithmic
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * ln(C1*x)

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.Power
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 * pow(x, C1)

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.Fourier
member.summary: Regression fit to the equation Y(x) = C0 + C1 * cos(x) + C2 * sin(x) + C3 * cos(2*x) + C4 * sin(2*x) + ...

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.MinX
member.summary: Minimal X-value.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.MinY
member.summary: Minimal Y-value.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.MaxX
member.summary: Maximum X-value.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.MaxY
member.summary: Maximum Y-value.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.AverageX
member.summary: Average X-value.

member.name: F:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.FitType.AverageY
member.summary: Average Y-value.

member.summary: Called when order has been changed.

member.summary: Update plotted data values.

member.summary: Perform the processing of data values.

member.name: M:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.TrendLine.Aproximate(System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the calculated(predicted) trend line value that corresponds to specified argument.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.TrendLine.FitType
member.summary: Gets or sets the fit type.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.TrendLine.Order
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of trend line. The order defines number of terms in polynom equation.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.Chart.Extended.TrendLine.Coefficients
member.summary: Gets the coefficients of equation.
